verbose_text: Additionally, 12-LOX is inhibited by baicalein, where the former increases the activity of HIF-1alpha under hypoxic conditions, causing the upregulation of the vascular endothelial growth factor, a major factor in promoting prostate cancer progression and metastasis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: 12-LOX is inhibited by baicalein, where the former increases the activity of HIF-1alpha under hypoxic conditions, causing the upregulation of the vascular endothelial growth factor
